name: Mytec Software Inc.
overview:
Commitment MYTecSoft Inc., is strongly committed to the overall success of an SAP implementation project, from our senior management to the implementation teams. The commitment doesn’t stop at only SAP implementation. It is applicable to any projects we undertake.

Results-Driven MYTecSoft’s results-driven philosophy creates a working environment and culture conducive to achieving implementation goals for clients.

Seamless Knowledge Transfer MYTecSoft strongly believes in transferring critical SAP and “best practice” knowledge from the implementation team to the client.

Commitment to Success upon Project Completion Business Process Orientation translates to an SAP deployment that allows our clients to achieve their own business objectives. MYTecSoft creates an infrastructure to track and monitor timelines, accountability and processes as measures of success - even after implementation.

Unparalleled Industry Experience MYTecSoft Inc., has experience in the length and breadth of consulting and SAP knowledge that is unmatched in the industry and applied with wide range of vertical markets including Wire & Cable, Nursery, Pharmaceuticals, Automobile, Discrete manufacturing etc.,

Proven Experience MYTecSoft Inc. has successfully completed over 15 SAP projects. Our experience in creating, executing and localizing global templates has become an industry standard especially in the Wire & Cable industry. MYTecSoft’s SAP implementation consultants have vast experience with a host of services to accelerate the implementation of SAP modules and solutions including Application support Help Desk Business Intelligence(BI) CRM End user training Human Capital Management(HCM) Post-implementation services SCM

MYTecSoft Inc. Highlights Focused on ERP, customer-centric solutions, and outsourcing since inception. Pioneered onsite/offshore model of ERP support from beginning and has since delivered accelerated results at significant cost advantages to hundreds of global clients Global consulting strength 200+ SAP consultants, with 110+ in India. Worldwide employees - 200+ Competency Centers for CRM, SCM, APO, BI, Corporate Governance, FI, SEM, Net Weaver, Implementation, upgrade & support experience across industry segments with strong vertical capabilities in Manufacturing, Consumer Products, Chemicals, Life Sciences and Media
